title: (3200-002) Lousã - 4 Rua Doutor Pedro Lemos
description: Laundry in Intermarche supermarket, easy parking

title: (3200) Lousã - 1 Rua Francisco Lopes Fernandes
description: Drinking water taps on the way to Lousa Castle. With a hose clamp we were able to fill up our van. Excellent ??

name: Terra da Barraquinha
title: (3200) Terra da Barraquinha
description: Camping Area "Terra da Barraquinha". View of the mountains of Lousã, quiet area in the middle of olive groves, about 500 meters away, grass base, simple sanitary facilities, electricity (paying) and water available, center of Lousã within walking distance. Fishing, swimming, cycling and walking within a radius of 5 km. Donations for site maintenance are greatly appreciated.

title: (3200-222) Lousã - 2 Rua Coimbra
description: To the right of the LIDL, at the end of the car park: 8 kg and 18 kg washing machines and an 18 kg dryer. Only cash payment possible.

title: (3200-254) Lousã - 17 Rua Armando Almeida e Silva
title_short: (3200-254) Lousã - 17 Rua Armando Almeida e Silva
description:
Self-Service Laundry
8:00 to 22:00
7 days a week

title: (3200) Lousã - Rua Doutor José Pinto de Aguiar
title_short: (3200) Lousã - Rua Doutor José Pinto de Aguiar
description: Parking lot of Continente/ Modelo Supermarket.

address.street: Rua Doutor José Pinto de Aguiar

title: (3200-114) Lousã - 5 Avenida Dom Manuel I
description:
A Parque de Estacionamento Municipal, near padaria, Lidl, Dia, restaurants, um de grelhados e outro o Portas Largas de uma bela sopa da pedra.
It is allowed to stay overnight.

title: (3200) Coimbra -
description: Free parking located at the foot of the Castelo de Lousâ, has bins and some lighting at night. Nearby there are public baths, natural pools, mountain routes and beautiful villages to visit. We spent one night with a medium-size van and without any problem, there were several ACs next to it, also staying overnight. We were going with a dog and except for the pools we could do everything with her.

title: (3200-242) Lousã - Variante à Nacional 236
description: Esplanade on the side of the road with good views

title: (3200) Lousã - Alameda Juiz Conselheiro Neves Ribeiro
title_short: (3200) Lousã - Alameda Juiz Conselheiro Neves Ribeiro
description:
Park next to the Green Park of Vila da Lousã.
Calm but without service.

title: (3200) - CM1235
description: Old venue for the Cabeço do Moiro festivities. Tem água e sanitários. Fabulous sight on Lousã.

title: (3200) Lousã - Unnamed road
description: Superb village of Talasnal to visit, but to get there the path is very difficult to access. The street and the parking lot are in a dead end, the U-turn is difficult for heavy goods vehicles. Ideal place for light vehicles, van or van, because 6.5m van seems the maximum possible. In addition, the parking lot is not flat but on a very steep slope (10°), good brakes necessary.

name: Parque de Pernoita do Terreiro das Bruxas
title: (3200) Parque de Pernoita do Terreiro das Bruxas
title_short: (3200) Parque de Pernoita do Terreiro das Bruxas
description: Beautifull spot in Serra da Lousã called Terreiro das Bruxas (Witches Path). Picnic spot and perfect for mountainbike or hiking. There's water in this spot

title: (3200) - Unnamed Road
description: Within the framework of the protocol signed between Baldios da Lousã and Land Lousã, on October 6, 2014, the Governing Council of Baldios da Lousã has the disposal of the 4x4 "Overlander", their Baldio do Brejo. About 2 Ha, more or less flat, with clean land and crossing it to Ribeira do Arneiro. Location with potential for any tourist terrain. A barbecue and a small toilet will soon be built. Coordinates, N40 08.249 W8 16.668. Night authorized.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful and quite place in the middle of the forest. If you go into the trees becareful not getting lost :)

title: (3200) Lousã - Unnamed Road
description:
Park right at the cliff with a stunning view over the stone village of Cerdeira. Only fits 1 small motorhome, although, behind it, there are more spots available for parking (just not with the same view).
It's not super leveled, but fine.
At the village there is a very small public river pool.
The village is amazing! It's called "home for creativity" since it's a place for art residences and other tourism.

Be careful about the access: it's a 3km very steep and narrow road with difficult curves for large vehicles.

This place is in the protected forest of Lousã. We had no problem with police, but be respectful about the area.

title: (3200) - 7 Rua Padre António Homem Carvalho
description: Small but nice parking place next to the river. very calm but some narrow roads to get there.

title: (3200) - EM552
description: Small picnic area with trash can and water tap under the bridge. Very well shaded. Possibility of swimming in the river. Access for van.

title: (3200) Lousã - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at the top of the hill near the swing with great views. Flat ground and possibility to stay overnight. Don't block access track on the left hand side. no bins so take rubbish with you.

name: Camping Municipal Park Serpins
title: (3200) Camping Municipal Park Serpins
description: Camping Municipal Park Serpins. Very simple, very local small campsite. Clean, close to the river Praia of Serpins, good little bar opposite, no emptying service, swimming pool in the campsite. The reception gives you 2 plans for very nice local hikes to do with the children. Good immersion.

title: (3200) -
description: Parque de merendas con piscina, barbacoa, baños, ducha, bar.

title: (3220) Miranda do Corvo - 34 Rua Doutor Mota Pinto
title_short: (3220) Miranda do Corvo - 34 Rua Doutor Mota Pinto
description: Laundromat, self service laundry. 5 minute walk from the Aire. Clean and good machines, ideally needs 8kg machine. Prices in picture.

name: Area di sosta camper Miranda do Corvo
title: (3220) Area di sosta camper Miranda do Corvo
title_short: (3220) Area di sosta camper Miranda do Corvo
description: Placed near a roundabout with access to the village, restaurant nearby. Very quiet at night.

name: Cabril do Ceira
title: (3200) Cabril do Ceira
description:
Only for vans or smaller, no motorhomes!!! 2 places. if coming from Coimbra or Góis do not take the immediate right after the bridge. Take the second or third right and follow the dirt road to the spot! Watch out for branches in the road. Beautiful and quiet place … busy at weekends but always quiet at night. 

Fires/bbq possible - BUT pay attention to wildfire season! 1st July to 30th September = Critical Fire Period, and it often does extend according to current situation. For current wildfire risk

title: (3330) - N342-3
description: Senhora da Candosa Panoramic view of the Ceira river valley. It has good trails and Garganta do Cabril. Ideal for the night.

title: (3220) Lamas - N341
description: Park for one or two very pleasant nights next to a river beach (Praia Fluvial do Vimieiro). Very beautiful and quiet place. There is a Restaurant by the river.

title: (3230-103) Louçainha - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place, beautiful landscape, spectacular pools with changing rooms, pic nic area, very nice restaurant !!!

title: (3200) São Miguel de Poiares - N2
description: At the edge of the N2 going towards Góis. Eucalyptus forest (partially burned, do not make fire!) Small hidden road from the road, good for one night no more. Very quiet, we hear a little noise from the road which is not very busy (Sunday evening)

name: Camping Moinho
title: (3280) Camping Moinho
description: Pleasant and calm place. No services for motorhomes.

title: (3280) Castanheira de Pêra - EM510-1
description: Beautiful small parking near the river. Better for vans, big motorhomes will not fit in the parking

title: (3330) Góis - Estr. das Beiras
description: Parking very easy to access. Petrol station in direct proximity as well as a restaurant. Possibility to see with the restaurateur and the gas station attendant to get water. Beautiful view over the whole valley, with several possible walks among the eucalyptus trees.

title: (3350) Vila Nova de Poiares - 156 Avenida Manuel Carvalho Coelho
title_short: (3350) Vila Nova de Poiares - 156 Avenida Manuel Carvalho Coelho
description: Nice and quiet area. Near the town centre.

title: (3230) Fetais - CM1192
description: Nice spot high up in the mountains, with a spectacular open view. Penela is visible straigh in front with Espinhal on the left. Great for a night stay off grid.

title: (3350) São Miguel de Poiares - Calçada da Igreja
title_short: (3350) São Miguel de Poiares - Calçada da Igreja
description: Quiet location, next to the church of São Miguel. Slightly tilted, you can rest or stay overnight.

title: (3040) Almalaguês -
description:
Very nice and clean parking area for 10-20 MH.  Cross the bridge and you have tables and benches in the shade of trees for a BBQ or picnic. In the back corner there are toilets. 
350m up in the village there is a bar and restaurant.

title: (3330) Góis - CM1361
description: Praia fluvial das Canaveias! Beautiful spot on the Ceira river, water, toilets, bar, sandy beach, overlooking the charming village of VN do Ceira. Spent several nights without problems

title: () Castanheira de Pêra - 2 Variante à Nacional 236
title_short: () Castanheira de Pêra - 2 Variante à Nacional 236
description: Free parking near a river and a water park. During the day and at night, however, quite restless!

title: (3280-012) Castanheira de Pêra - 5 Avenida Adrião Reis
title_short: (3280-012) Castanheira de Pêra - 5 Avenida Adrião Reis
description: Public free and flat parking in the center of town, at the back of a supermarket. Close to everything: ATM, post office, taxi, coffe shops, supermarket, restaurants, bakery. Easy to be full at labor hours of working days.

title: (3280) Castanheira de Pêra - Variante à Nacional 236
title_short: (3280) Castanheira de Pêra - Variante à Nacional 236
description: In front of Rocas beach. Public area without service. Good for day and night

title: (3280-022) Castanheira de Pêra - 24 Variante à Nacional 236
title_short: (3280-022) Castanheira de Pêra - 24 Variante à Nacional 236
description: ASA service, very well done, parking possible but not ideal, better to go on the parking after the pool. Services.

name: Góis Camping
title: () Góis Camping
description:
Municipal campsite. No dedicated campervan services.
10 mins to cafés, shops, river swimming.

title: (3220) Ceira -
description: After looking for a quiet place close to Coimbra (we went near the river beach further down, but the parkfornight spots were very noisy with lots of people partying), we finally found this small dirt road, in the Heights. Very calm, that helped us out a lot.

title: (3330) Góis - 15 Bairro Combatentes da Grande Guerra
title_short: (3330) Góis - 15 Bairro Combatentes da Grande Guerra
description: Impasse with possibility of turning, panorama and small brick seats, above the campsite (now closed in December), below a church with a small park. Nice view of Goís, right a path with stairs leads to the city. The city offers free wifi. We had a quiet night, neither man nor car here, in summer probably very popular and lively. Trash can crowded, no service, just peace and a beautiful panaorama. Fast WiFi (GOISWIFI).

title: (3350) - EM554
description: Place at the top of a small mountain, in a part of the forest that is being planted (take care). Wooden picnic tables and a small water tap (right next to the tables). Calm and serenity guaranteed! We met the rangers who told us we could stay!

name: Camping Quinta do Castanheiro
title: (3280) Camping Quinta do Castanheiro
description: Super quiet place, the owner is super friendly and attentive.  has all conditions for motorhomes.  Shaded spaces, zone for cleaning the toilet tank. it has a small but always clean pool.  Clean and local toilet always with everything organized.

title: (3220) Ceira - 5 Quelha dos Louros
description: Parking just outside Coimbra if you want to escape the party noise on the weekend. With the Womo about 10 minutes to the city. Very quiet. Maybe there is a train station here. We were here at the weekend - no trains and almost no traffic. Illuminated.

title: (3350) Venda Nova -
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks. Lots of tables available

title: (3330) Góis - 77 N2
description: A great place by the Ceira River, surrounded by trees, with lots of shade and very quiet.

title: (3330-209) Góis - 3 Avenida Engenheiro Augusto Nogueira Pereira
title_short: (3330-209) Góis - 3 Avenida Engenheiro Augusto Nogueira Pereira
description: All facilities .... Police Station next door

title: (3230-072) Espinhal - 1 Largo Feira
description: Good and quiet place for parking spend the night .. water and public clean toilets near by .. all the locals drink the water from the spring . small super market with the sweetest lady and her dog  just around the corner .. her name is Alice and the dogs name is Boneka .. about the bakery it’s the best corn bread called broa ever just past the church .. and the post office is just across the street will be back if I be near here ..

title: (3230-072) Espinhal - 10 Rua Mercado
description: Great place in a olive orchard to stay a night in a quite village .. there is garbage disposal container next to it and public toilets and an outdoor pick- nick table and a bakery close by that is open even on Sunday

title: (3300) Pombeiro da Beira - Unnamed Road
description: Igreja Santa Quitéria (santuário).

title: (3030-273) Coimbra - 13 Rua Rio
description: Location is very difficult to access for motorhomes. Very nice spot on parking by the river, direct access to a small beach next to a small dam, perfect for this refresh. Snack bar and public toilets with a bonus of two showers (but beware of mosquitoes). Places frequented by families but very quiet at night. Fishy river for lovers of poles. Only hic watering the field next door with group so noise early in the morning, do not park next to the well.

title: (3030-336) Coimbra - 18b Rua Barca do Mondego
description: Very nice gravel course just a few meters from the river. Some straight spots to park, but unfortunately no shade on the vehicle. The driveway is a bit narrow and has a hairpin bend. With a 6 m van it was still easy to do. Directly at the river some larger trees grow under which you can get shade and go into the water. Only a few minutes walk to a hiking trail and over the bridge is the next Praia Fluvial with a beach bar not far away. Trash cans are available. Internet reception is good.

name: Uxa Paraíso
title: (3230-290) Uxa Paraíso
description: Small, intimate campsite in nature yet just outside of the small historic town of Penela with all its amenities. The easiest way to reach the place is to look for the "Church of Nossa Senhora da Conceiçao" (google maps knows it in Penela) and from there just follow the large blue signs UXA PARAISO all the way to the parking space and come find me at the bar/swimming pool. Also feel free to contact me if you need a little extra push in the last uphill.

title: (3230-114) Espinhal - 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos
title_short: (3230-114) Espinhal - 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos
description: Quiet beautiful place with stream. Very recommended Large parking spot near stream, grass, trees, tables and benches. Next to ExperTree Park with rooftop climb. Stayed for 1 night with another camper, it was very quiet.

address.street: 56 Rua Professor Doutor Luis A. Duarte Santos

title: (3230-347) Santa Eufémia - M558
description: CC service area, within the grounds of the shopping center and service station (Penela Center), paying drinking water, free black water and waste water discharge. No overnight parking.

title: (3360) Vila Nova de Poiares - N110
description: Loreto Naura Park - Picnic Park with car park, tables, chairs, water and barbecue facilities located by the river where there is a small dam.

title: (3220) Ceira -
description:
Pitches by the river with a beach.
At the beginning of April we were completely alone here for two days, even though it was the weekend. (Most likely busier in summer.)
Great for swimming and fishing.
At the pedestrian bridge there is a trail that leads up.

The driveway is a bit bumpy and there were large puddles, which were not a problem despite the low ground clearance. Turning circle at the end of the path relatively small and sandy - but was easy to do with a 6m van.
Take a look at the path on foot beforehand.
Apart from the parking space at the turning circle, there is plenty of space along the way or next to the bridge. Here, however, the big road is much more present. At the turning circle only perceptible as background noise.

title: (3230-267) Penela - 13 Praça Municipio
description: Quiet level parking lot right next to the castle

title: () Penela - 11 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
title_short: () Penela - 11 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
description: Large car park close to the village café and restaurant 2 minutes walk, castle with lovely views, petrol station just across the road.

title: (3360) - 2 Rua Principal da Calçada
description: Waterfront area with tables, barbecue, water and shaded. Perfect for a break see a night!

title: (3230-263) Penela - 15 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
title_short: (3230-263) Penela - 15 Avenida Bombeiros Voluntários de Penela
description: Good place to spend the night, very quiet and with plenty of parking lots in the area.

name: Parque de campismo de Coimbra
title: (3030-011) Parque de campismo de Coimbra
description: Nice communal campsite. About 20 years old with a great location. 750 pitches with electricity, free wifi at reception. Bus stop in front of the campsite to visit the city.

title: (3330) Góis - Largo Manuel Francisco Martins
description: Self service - washhouse. Here you can wash your laundry yourself in a wash house. There are six washing places. Outside the door is a fountain with fresh water.

title: (3360) - N110
description: Small beach near the river below the road (a few cars). Place in the middle of the forest. Few insects. Be careful however dam upstream, fluctuation of the water level

title: (3330) Góis - M543
description:
Nice little parkin next to some ruins.

Very quiet, some gardeners came to cut some grass in the morning. otherwise we heard about 5 cars coming past.

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: On the bank of the river, but overhanging, so a priori no risk of submersion. calm apart from the barking of dogs in the distance. Accessible by small van or 4x4

title: (3350) Lavegadas - R. Portela do Carvalho
description: Magnificent free motorhome area (under construction?) with picnic table, swing, barbecue & water tap! Incredible view of the river! Clay, a little sloping on the other hand. Stony path to get there but ok in CC of 7m40!

title: (3330) Alvares - Largo Soito
description: City center of Alvares. Right to beach.

title: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
title_short: (3230) Ferraria Ferraria de São João - CM1196
description: Mountainbike Funtrail of Ferraria de São João. This is the basecamp of the funtrail complete with picnic tables, hot showers, WC, large trash containers and a paid cleaning station for your bike. The trail looks pretty abandoned, the facilities however were open, proper and working. There's only space for 4 vehicles parked door to door, so I'd say 1 camper staying here is plenty.

title: (3360) Penacova - O Pioneiro do Mondego
description: Very nice spot next to the river. we spent the night here to do the kayak next morning with O PIONEIRO DO MONDEGO

title: (3360) Penacova - 4 Rua Carreira
description:
Parking by the main road (20 meters), going through the village. Space for 4 ACs. We will spend the night here because we could not find a safe/accessible way to get to the spot registered nearby (by the river bank).
It's now close to 21h, in November, and there are only a few cars and a few trucks driving by. 
It's pretty dark. A few orange lights on the road but not very bright.
It will be just fine for the night, despite a dog barking in the background. 
Doesn't seem to be any kind of services.

title: (3360) Lorvão - 10 Rua Rio da Ponte
description: Very friendly small village to visit, close to Penacova and Coimbra. The biggest point of interest is the Monastery, 100 meters away. It's very interesting.

name: Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
title: (3360) Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
title_short: (3360) Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
description: Park of Campismo de Penacova da FMCP. Super simple camping but nickel, impeccable health, near the river and a small beach, owners very friendly French speaking, idyllic

title: (3000-271) Coimbra - 36 Avenida Marnoco e Sousa
description: Coimbra viewpoint with lawn area and benches. We stopped to cook something and eat with a view, very quiet. It is likely that nothing will happen to spend the night here. Free.

title: () Penacova - 2 N2
description: Parking snack of the campsite. Feet in the water and calm for the night. Right just after the cemetery.

title: (3360) Penacova - 1 Avenida João Antonio Gomes
description: Penacova, charming village with permanent and free area outside the cities and the coast. Easy access from Coimbra with beautiful landscapes. CAUTION DIFFICULT ACCESS THROUGH THE TOP OF THE CITY, DO NOT FOLLOW THE "AIRO DE SERVICIO" BURNING BUT GO TO THE FIRE STATION FROM THE BASE OF THE CITY, THE AREA IS NEAR!

title: (3360) Penacova - N2
description: Trail running centre, car park with bar at the top, building below with free showers and toilets, motorcycle washing station, very pretty viewpoint and beautiful hikes to do in the surroundings, beach and picnic tables.

title: (3360) Penacova - 8 N235
description: Road next to the river, after a detour with a sign of fishing area. The road is dirt but easy to access and comfortable. At the end of the road, there is a large space that can accommodate 3 or 4 vans. The place is ideal to spend the night with a fabulous view of the city

title: (3000-329) Coimbra - Rua Lourenco de Almeida Azevedo
title_short: (3000-329) Coimbra - Rua Lourenco de Almeida Azevedo
description:
Large parking day, fee, and night, free, in the center, flat, next to a public park, ideal for van or van (max 6m) for fairly long spur places. Empty at night, apparently fills up around 8am. Very calm night, I positioned myself long on two places because the carpark is empty before 8h, after it is necessary to be positioned on the spot on the cob or leave to respect the parking.

40.2085635, -8.4158948 
the exact entrance on Google.
it was difficult to find.

title: (3000-042) Coimbra - 15 Rua Padre António Vieira
description: R. de Tomar - Parking in quiet street, to solve a night. The AC Area was closed for a competition and the rest of the car parks that appeared were small for AC access. Soon he parked another AC just ahead. No problems with neighbors or police. During the night some cars and people passed by talking loudly but we were able to sleep.

title: (3040-378) Santa Clara - 5 Rua José Pompeu Aroso
title_short: (3040-378) Santa Clara - 5 Rua José Pompeu Aroso
description: Very quiet shaded car park facing the tennis courts.

title: (3040) Coimbra - Parque do Choupalinho
description: Ideal to leave the vehicle and visit the city. 15 minutes from the university. Nice views. Before it was a caravan area. You can hear the road but it is a quiet place. Ideal to go with children because they can bathe. There is a beach bar next to the yacht club. Close to the living science exploratory center.

title: (3040) Coimbra - Rua António Gonçalves
description: Parking with several motorhomes. It looks calm. We didn't see it until we noticed that the AA area, next to Inês de Castro avenue, was closed to prohibited traffic to the AA. No amenities.

title: (3000-239) Coimbra - R. Arco da Traicao
description: Parking for the quiet day

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: Nice spot next to the river and his waterfall so we don’t here the road. Nice view over Ponte. Lots of place all the long of the road

title: (3000-213) Coimbra - Largo Feira dos Estudantes
description: Small flat and quiet car park . The car park is reserved during the day for the church on one side and for the students on the other… thank you for respecting…

title: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
title_short: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
description: Oficina com todos os serviços, desde mecânica a reparação e pintura de chapa, e venda e reparação de todos os acessórios de autocaravanas no, caravanismo e campismo.

title: (3000-481) Coimbra - 65 Rua Inácio Duarte
description: Park on a Saturday without problem, there is no blue zone or time limit. After walking around the City, I found it the quietest and safest place to leave the van and rest at night. A few minutes from the most central and beautiful streets

title: (3320) Pampilhosa da Serra -
description: You stand flat on a firm sandy surface and you have a beautiful view of almost 360°. There is not a single shadow.

title: (3040-252) Coimbra - 23 Rua Feitoria dos Linhos
description: Park and miniature land nearby.

title: (3150) Rabaçal - N347-1
description: Dirt road between Zambujal and Rabaçal, some engine noises coming from the main road but possibility of advancing further on impeccable track.

title: (3000-274) Coimbra - 90 Rua Martins de Carvalho
description: It's the market parking. Very well located to visit the city. In 10 minutes you are at the University. Small vehicles only.

title: (3040-262) Coimbra - 124 Rua Mendes dos Remédios
description: Very clean laundry with coffee machine, snacks, magazines and newspapers. You have to exchange bills for coins. It is on a sloping street and has nice views towards the city center

title: (3040) Cernache -
description: Quiet spot (church chime in the distance), easy access with a van. It works with a 7.60m motorhome but it was a bit tricky. Access from N342 / 347 from the intersection 800m east of the site of the Roman ruins of Conimbriga. You can also park at the spot just above by taking the dirt track in good condition.

title: (3040-256) Coimbra - Avenida João das Regras
description: It is a paid car park on weekdays. We went in on Friday night and out on Sunday and it was free. It is well located, although noisy on Saturday night. Next to the Ciudad de los Pequenitos, you can cycle along the river and the city by crossing the bridge.

name: Parque Campismo Municipal de Penacova
title: (3360) Parque Campismo Municipal de Penacova
description: It is a nice park, small and quiet, with good shadows and a beautiful view of the Mondego river. It is closed for renovation

title: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
title_short: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
description:
Calm, safe, peaceful. Inside a private property, next to the forest.
Possible access to water, electricity, 17meter swimming pool, bathroom (only cold water), kitchen with microwave (but no gas for cooking) table and chairs. 
Animals may be accepted, we have a calm dog that usually is happy having new visitors. But better check first. 

You can check out till 10pm at night. 

Hugs from Portugal

title: (3000-175) Coimbra - 72 Avenida Fernão de Magalhães
description: Car park for mobile homes/buses UP TO 2.3 m in height. Very centrally located.

title: (3150) - Rua Engenheiro Álvaro Costa Alemão Teixeira
title_short: (3150)  - Rua Engenheiro Álvaro Costa Alemão Teixeira
description:
RESERVATION IS OBLIGATORY. CALL or WHATSAPP TO BOOK. Parking space at an olive farm. Park in a quiet valley surrounded by a small river and olive trees. Suitable for children and animals (if yours like ours). Amazing place to visit the ruins of Conimbriga, the caves of Buracas de Casmilo and other walks in the Sico area. Coimbra by car only 15 minutes away (bus stop nearby) Attention: Difficulty for motorhomes over 7m. Since we are farmers and it's a private property we like people in before 9 PM 

Olive Oil tours and tastings available mornings between 09.00/10.00 h

address.street: Rua Engenheiro Álvaro Costa Alemão Teixeira

title: (3360) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice parking spot. Adorable Swimming spot. Small and cheap Resto/snackbar. Lifeguards, watermill, toilets. Good spot to start a walk (2hours or 4hours). Very quit to sleep. Dogs aloud on terras not on the beach.

title: (3360-249) São Pedro de Alva -
description: New Motorhome Area. Many places. Close to the river beach of Vimieiro. With restaurant. Very beautiful!! Supermarket Casa Videira in the centre of the São Pedro de Alva village, at 15 min driving (IC6 road). WC near the river beach. Very quiet and safe. Attention! Do not drive through villages where the passage can be very narrow!! access only via the IC6 road!!

title: (3000-317) Coimbra - 20 Rua Abel Dias Urbano
description: Intermarché with washing machines in the car park. Public toilets inside the supermarket. No water/trash/recycling or any other services here.

title: (3360) Penacova - E801
description: Excellent spot for parking with public toilets without the need to leave the main road.

title: () - CM1158
description: Place where you can park your motor home for a night. Close to a public garden, and also a football camp with synthetic grass. Silent and quite. Near you have a lot of river beaches. Bathrooms close (just follow the indications).

title: (3000-268) Coimbra - 22 Rua Mário Pais
description: Correct and clean laundry. Several machines of different sizes and dryers. Not possible to pay by card. Only in cash. The manager is friendly. Small bakery / snack bar following the street, "O Moinho Velho" while waiting. Beware of large vehicles, these are small streets with parking lots along and deliveries blocking. So go there on foot preferably from the paid car park behind the Opel dealership, in the main street, which belongs to CONTINENT, a supermarket. No problem for standard size vans. Parkometer in the streets.

title: (3360) Penacova - IP3
description: Great place to spend the night coming out of the IP3 easy access by van or 4x4 the path has some ruts.

title: (3040-193) Coimbra - 99 Avenida da Guarda Inglesa
description: Street parking, about 15 mins to downtown. Also suitable for long mobile homes. Spaces are also often occupied by trucks. No time limit. Caution! Only behind the abs. No stopping parking.

title: (3230) Rabaçal - N347-1
description: Next to Rabaçal, on a small hill, next to the cemetery. Possibility to buy Rabaçal cheese (ewe-goat) at home.

title: (3000-324) Coimbra - 1 Rua Padre Melo
description: Lots of parking spaces next to the street at the cemetery.

title: (3000-324) Coimbra - 15 Rua Padre Melo
description: Next to the cemetery, but better than right in front of the cemetery, because in front of the cemetery there is quite a commotion in the morning, flower stalls make a primary school next to it. Here you have a view of the old cemetery and are very quiet.

title: (3040) Coimbra - Avenida Conimbriga
description: Large parking lot on the "side of the road", which necessarily involves a little decibel during the day. -There is a very well-rated snack bar: this place is perfect for eating at noon, as well as for taking an afternoon nap before hitting the road again. - as regards the night: I found it very reassuring (always the same, it's next to the road, but the night was calm)

title: (3360) Miro - Rua Barca
description: Parking overlooking a small valley very quiet.

title: (3040-389) Coimbra - 3 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrade e Silva
title_short: (3040-389) Coimbra - 3 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrade e Silva
description: Parkingspot at a mall. If you need to go shopping, you can park your motorhome here. Be aware, 3.5t max. Not a perfect place, but very busy and safe.

address.street: 3 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrade e Silva

title: (3044-250) Coimbra - nº1 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrada e Silva
title_short: (3044-250) Coimbra - nº1 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrada e Silva
description: Parking marked for AC in a shopping center. Room for some 10 BC city center 3.50 in UBER. Safe place there is a camera. Shopping center with all services (bars, restaurants, gas station, shop,... There was A.C in the parking lot above but this one is better.

address.street: nº1 Avenida José Bonifácio de Andrada e Silva

title: (3270) Vila Facaia - EM516
description: Very pleasant place with river beach in the village of Monastery, very quiet place in the middle of nature, good.to stay and overnight is worth trying

title: (3300) Arganil - EM523
description:
Service area at an intermarche gas station.
All services free.
Also, cheaper fuel than anywhere else seen so far. 
There is a big parking lot right next to the gas station.

title: (3000-108) Coimbra - 155 Rua Cidade de Poitiers
description: Laundry and dogwash. Very practical for washing your laundry and your 4-legged friend! Cash payment (coins only) and coin dispenser on the laundry side. We were lucky enough to be able to park our van on the street (free parking).

title: () Condeixa-a-Velha - Museu e Ruinas
description: Parking lot of the ruins of Cominbriga. Flat, shaded, several places for coaches available. Quiet night guaranteed. The toilets in the museum are clean (10 am-7pm).

title: (3300-016) Arganil - 18 Rua Olivença
description: Intermarché supermarket parking lot.  Allowed overnight in the dirt part of the parking lot.  Good location for visiting the city

title: (3020-119) Eiras - 8 Travessa Santo António
description: Picnic area with barbecue grill, has a toilet, quiet area with a river next to it

title: (3150-109) Condeixa-a-Nova - 19 Urbanização Quinta Nova
description: Big land park, with lots of space, garden and children's playground and service area close by.

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Velha - 7 Rua Igreja
description: Church parking lot, fairly quiet area except for the church chime ...

title: (3300-045) Arganil -
description: Park near the central area of Arganil. Quiet and ideal for spending a day or spending the night.

title: (3360) Gavinhos - Los Moinhos
description: Few flat places but if one finds it, that will make a great night, among the stars.

title: () Coimbra - Rua do Centro Hipico
description: Very large parking beside a large park (Mata nacional do Choupal). Free to park. Only bins available on this site. We only stayed for a few hours during the day on a Sunday. The place was quiet and would be suitable for overnight stay.   one road (N111-1) coming from town to the carpark has a height limit of 2.3m, so plan your route carefully.

title: (3150-135) Condeixa-a-Nova - C Rua do Mercado
description: Free parking area for regular sized cars but motor homes are welcome if you can fit in. No extra long parking spots or signed parking a for motor homes. The parking has facilities with the possibility of discharging gray water and empty toilet cassette. Free water, tap has no thread. Center within walking distance.

title: (3360) Penacova - 84 Rua Estrada Nova
description: Tap with water next to the road. The water flows strong enough to fill quickly.

title: (3300) São Martinho da Cortiça - 54 N17
description: Quiet place for picnics and overnight stays.  Tables, barbecue, water.  Sloping surface, wedges must be underlaid.

title: (3270) Adega - 72 CM1170
description: Picnic area with bar, benches, barbecue, and very clean public restrooms. Good for a stopover, but not for sleeping, because it is on the side of a road. Parking is tight for a large caravan.

title: (3270) - CM1165
description: Parking place near a little church, places to sit and get fresh water for free! Lake 5min away.

title: (3020) Coimbra - 37 Rua Manuel Madeira
description: Place on the outskirts of Coimbra ideal to rest and eat something in the shade of the trees.

name: Parque Municipal de Campismo de Arganil
title: (3300) Parque Municipal de Campismo de Arganil
title_short: (3300) Parque Municipal de Campismo de Arganil
description:
Small campsite with basic facilities. 
Very nice environment near river Alva.
Access to tents, caravans and motorhomes.
Green parcels and some shade.

title: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - Rua Principal
description: River Beach Park Aldeia Ana de Aviz. Access to barbecue and water to wash dishes.

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Nova - 45 Rua do carvalho
description: Washing machines and gas station at an intermarche. The parking lot itself cannot be used for mobile homes due to the height limit of 2.50 m, but there are plenty of free parking spaces on the street around it. Here we also stood with our 6.36m van. The gas station was also cheaper than others in the area.

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: Great spot for a night calm beautiful views

title: (3150) Casmilo - 3150 Rua Barreiro
description: Small friendly place, at the start of the hike "vale das buracas", climbing site nearby. Picnic tables and drinking fountain available.

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Nova - 10 Urbanização Nova de Conímbriga 2
description: Self-service laundromat with parking spaces in front for vans :).  3 dryers available.

title: (3240) Avelar - Ferraria-Gondramaz-São Simão
description: Brand new parking lot. Much less sloping than the parking lots at the departure point of the passadiços :) Shaded, really great.

title: (3150-252) Coimbra - 13 Rua Principal
description: Good for a night quiet not for R.V

title: (3360) - 474 N235
description: Laundromat in the Auchan car park

title: (3260) Simao - Ferraria-Gondramaz-São Simão
description: Parking at the end of the street. very sloping but with a great view and view of the river.

title: (3260) Figueiró Dos Vinhos -
description: Nice parking, Very calm in the winter. Very close To the river and trekking To a beautiful old stone village.

title: (3045-423) Ribeira de Frades - 6 Rua Castanheiros
description: Drinking water point. not possible to fill the tanks, but for bottles or cans, it is no problem. Picnic area on site. No parking space for large vehicles. Except along the street.

title: (3270) - Unnamed Road
description: A quiet location, right on the Albufeira waterfront. There are picnic tables. Ideal for an overnight stay.

title: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - CM1135-1
description: A 10-minute drive from Fragas de São Simão (with river beaches) and close to sport climbing spots. Quiet area surrounded by a small forest. On the same site is the Figueiró dos Vinhos Hunting Club and there are two tennis courts. Water tap without thread. Figueiró dos Vinhos county tourist map (Portuguese + English) at service area.

title: (3360) Penacova - Unnamed Road
description: A place next to an old burned down villa. A nice discovery very quiet for the night!

title: (3130) Soure -
description:
Small parking lot of the Santuari Nossa Sra. do Circulo.
At the top of a hill, with beautiful views.
The sanctuary seems quite abandoned.
Very quiet night. Space for several vehicles.

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 3270 Rua da Fonte de Baixo
title_short: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 3270 Rua da Fonte de Baixo
description: Water can fill cans, good flow

title: (3045) Taveiro - Rua Santa Eufémia
description: About 80 meters off a small quiet road. Flat and in the trees but little shade. Would be a great spot if it weren't for all the rubbish. No services.

name: Pedrogão Grande Camping Park
title: (3270) Pedrogão Grande Camping Park
description:
Pedrogão Grande Camping Park is located next to the Cabril dam over the River Zêzere, 1 km from the village of Pedrogão Grande. With exposure to the east and excellent views over the reservoir and its banks.
There are spacious and flat spaces, suitable for maneuvering and having your vehicle, caravan and/or accessories parked. There is a proper place to supply and unload sanitary cassettes. The Park has a central, circular path, entering on one side of the reception building and exiting on the other.

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - Rua Mário Coelho Fernandes
title_short: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - Rua Mário Coelho Fernandes
description: Parque de estacionamento perto do centro vila. Tranquilo e plano

title: (3360) - N235
description: Small flat area. Possibility of parking for any camping car template. Village with various shops a few hundred meters. Quiet day and night in the middle of nature.

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - Rua do Vau
description: Beautiful place next to the cabril dam, in the center of nature. good place for baths, with barbecue area with tables, very good place to be, worth getting to this place paradisíaco

title: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 30 Avenida Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (3270) Pedrógão Grande - 30 Avenida Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: Nice spacious parking place available. Good for bigger campers.

title: (3045) Ribeira de Frades - 106 Rua Santiago
description: Water fountain ideal for refilling.

title: (6100) Pedrógão Pequeno - Unnamed Road
description: Superb spot very quiet ... I allow myself to add this one because we went in Heavyweight of 2.30m wide and a height of 3.70m ... Some small branches touch but without damage! Possibility to continue the track with other spots further afield ...

title: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - 3 Rua 25 de Abril
title_short: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - 3 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Free flat parking for motorhomes allowing 48h, near the small city (municipal market on Saturday morning) and their monuments. Tourist information panel on site. No facilities (search service area on surrounding of city), only parking. Safe and quiet at night (illuminated).

title: (6100) - Unnamed Road
description: A small road up a little before the dam and becoming an engraved path will lead you to pretty quiet places at the edge of the water. Welcome swim at the end of the day in the shade of the tall pines. Avoid any time with too bulky vehicles.

title: (3300) - 2 Estrada Principal
description:
River beach just off the main road by a bridge. Plenty of parking suitable for campers, great sitting area under trees in the shade. Toilet facilities and an outdoor shower. Also a play park for kids. Quiet, peaceful spot. 
New cafe/bar (Passo e Fico) is open with amazing food and drinks and ready to give you the best tips to look around.
Pass here and enjoy life. ❤️

title: (3360) Sazes de Lorvão - 522 N235
description: Water fountain on side of road just up from a cafe and mini supermarket

title: (3300) - EM543
description: Parking at the top of a mound, at the entrance of Cepos (village hall), toilets nearby, lost in the mountains

title: (3045-448) Taveiro - 16 Beco A
description: Quiet little town. 30 m from the gendarmerie. Bakery and grocery store 50 m. Withdrawal of money. Public toilets.

title: (3300) Secarias - N342
description: A Praia Fluvial (sandy beach) on the water, near a dam. Possibility to stay overnight. Maximum 2 campers to keep the peace and keep the place. Across the street SUP for rent. (Quinta do Rio Alva) Restaurant within walking distance. Toilets available in July / August. Keep it neat and clean!

title: (3360-222) São Paio de Mondego - 13 Rua Ermidas
title_short: (3360-222) São Paio de Mondego - 13 Rua Ermidas
description: parking place

title: (3300) Secarias -
description: Continuing the dirt road (practicable because weeded and cleaned), at the edge of the river, we quickly arrive at a deforested area with 3 or 4 places maximum.

title: (3240) Chão de Couce - Rua Amarela
description:
VL and PL parking with picnic tables and trash can in an industrial zone. No shade but very quiet.
perfect for a stopover

title: (3420) Carapinha - 10 EM524
description: Very quiet, nice places to visit near by

title: (6100) - CM1098
description: Topview, silence, nearby church;). Do not forget to take care of your waste with you!

title: (3360) Portela - Estrada da Serra
description: Picnic area with parking and tables.

title: (3045) Taveiro - R. Q.ta do Outeiro
description: Picnic area with grill possibility and parking space on gravel

title: (3300) - EM544
description: Great picnic stop several places for parking possibility of sleeping for 1 or 2 camper table to eat view on the valley

title: (3240) - Unnamed Road
description: Lovely hill top spot at the Outeiro traditional windmills. Gravel approach track and large, fairly flat parking area. No shade. Beautiful views all round. Lots of walking paths around this area.

title: (6100-519) Pedrógão Pequeno - 4 Rua do Areal
description: Water point next to an urban park.

title: (6100-519) Pedrógão Pequeno - Estrada Moinho das Freiras
title_short: (6100-519) Pedrógão Pequeno - Estrada Moinho das Freiras
description: Very steep climb at the end. We barely made it. But it's worth the try.

title: (3330) Colmeal -
description: There was nothing nearby that made us stop here. Very quiet during the night the occasional car. we have an 8.5 meter camper.

title: (3360-316) Travanca do Mondego - N228
description:
Parking space next to the dam, beautiful view, flat terrain and waste bin available. At the end of the afternoon / early evening you can hear traffic, but after that it became quiet. In the morning, an employee of the dam parked there, we spent the night there without any problems.
Later we saw that you can also stand underneath if you take the exit just after/before the parking lot. Via 100m off road you come to a flat area with gravel, which is probably a quieter place.

title: (3025) Coimbra - N234-1
description: Nice piknic area with tables and chairs. Near a road, so nice for the day to rest a little bit.

title: (3440) Óvoa - Unnamed Road
description:
Possibility to drive to the water with a 4x4.
(Not the path that leads to the bar)

title: (3025) - 109 Rua Coimbra
description: Self service - washhouse! Here is the possibility to wash his own laundry by hand. Clotheslines are hanging in the front yard, so you can dry your laundry afterwards in the sun. A well (no drinking water!) Is also available.

title: () - Rua do Ferreiro
description: Large parking in a village with all the comforts. Toilet, store, games, table and water.

title: (3320-206) Pampilhosa da Serra - R. do Bairro São Martinho Lote 7 E
title_short: (3320-206) Pampilhosa da Serra - R. do Bairro São Martinho Lote 7 E
description: Mini Preco Supermarket with 24 hour laundry facilities.  Plenty of free parking and no height restriction.

address.street: R. do Bairro São Martinho Lote 7 E

title: (3450) - IP3
description: Clay, very close to the dam, fairly flat, a bit noisy because of the highway bridge next to it

title: (3240) Ansião - 2 Rua Manuel Melo
description: Park for small motorhomes

title: (3320) Pampilhosa da Serra - EM547
description: Complete motorhome area (also motorhome washing machine) in mountainous Cabril river valley, about 600m away from village center and nice river beach. Flat but without shadows; few picnic tables. NOTE: payment only by cash (notes & coins); water filling (about 100 L). When arriving gate, touch button and get ticket, also used to pay (machine with few languages at right side of toilets) and open gate at outlet.

title: (3150) Arzila - 2-7 Rua do Serrado de Baixo
title_short: (3150) Arzila - 2-7 Rua do Serrado de Baixo
description: Small town where you can find great people and a small but quiet place to rest and have a picnic in the nature. Close to this local you have the headquarters of the Grupo Folclórico e Etnográfico de Arzila and the interpretation center of the Arzila's Paul which you must visit.

title: (3240) Ansião - 7 Avenida Doutor Vítor Faveiro
description: Parque do Mercado…optimal to visit the whole area…sossegado…care for fairs and market days (Saturday)

title: (3045) Ameal - Unnamed Road
description: 16 kms from Coimbra going towards the coast Flat land with easy access, in a meadow, in mimosas We spent an evening and a night there without seeing anyone Only downside: the noise of the nearby road but it is not hellish

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Flat parking passed the bars. The road's a bit bumpy but we managed in a 6m motorhome. Easy access to swim a paddle board. Others do pass along the road but it's mainly fishermen or other water users - only occasional vehicles. It is in full sun so maybe too hot in summer but there are a couple of small spots shaded by the trees suitable for campervans. Theres also a huge sloping area going down to the waters edge ideal if you're in more of an off road vehicle or van and dont mind using rocks to level.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Very nice space with Aguieira Dam

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estrada Senhora da Ribeira
description: Cool place, with shade, clear water and a beach for swimming. There is even a toilet and a free shower to rinse. 2 parkings to park. The bigger one doesn't have shade. The 2nd that I indicate has some places in the shade. Bar and restaurant on the site.

title: (3305) Coja - Rua Doutor Egas Fafes
description: This place is great in the weekends. During weekdays there is some activity during the day but at night it's also quiet. The parking is level and next to a little park. Mostly suitable for vans. Free water tap.

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Praça Padre A. T. Dias
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Praça Padre A. T. Dias
description: Very quiet and ideal place to spend a few days. 20 minutes from the pastry shop. We were a night without any problems and far from everything. Without services Idyllic place without a doubt.

name: School Motorhome Park
title: (3440) School Motorhome Park
description: Park, swimming pool, wi fi, grill...

title: (3305) Coja - Rua Levada
description: Pleasant parking at the edge of the village, near a large landscaped green area and starting from 4 mountain bike trails. Very quiet at night despite the small paved road. free wifi means. shower and toilet open during the day.

title: (3300) - EM508
description: Arrived with Van California 4x4, probably also for non-ideal campers, a nice place on a stretch that leads to wind turbines, but a poor enough telephone network. Close to Piodao, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and other beautiful villages like Benfeita.

title: (3305-150) Coja - 42 Rua Doutor José Albano de Oliveira
title_short: (3305-150) Coja - 42 Rua Doutor José Albano de Oliveira
description: Nice place to Park and Stay the night, Next to the river, restaurants and the Park. Nice and calm place to Stay.

address.street: 42 Rua Doutor José Albano de Oliveira

title: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estr. Sra. da Ribeira
title_short: (3440) Pinheiro de Ázere - Estr. Sra. da Ribeira
description: Nice little forest area tucked away, follow the path down a few meters and there's a gorgeous sunset view. Quiet, decent 4g. A few tissues and stuff on the floor unfortunately, but that seems to be everywhere now.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Large flat parking place near restaurant that is a close, also near road but quiet and calm. Good for stay overnight. Climbing areas and water are close. We stayed here 4 nights without problém.
